io.github.teamfractal.screens

Class Overlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage
        • io.github.teamfractal.screens.Overlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenerationOverlay, ResourceMarketScreen, RoboticonMarketScreen

    public class Overlay
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Overlay(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color fillColor, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color lineColor, float regionWidth, float regionHeight, float xOffset, float yOffset, int lineThickness)
      Creates a stage that itself places a table of the specified parameters to an offset away from centre of the screen The overlay's [draw()] method is unlike that of the standard Stage class as it also draws a bordered rectangle behind the overlay region, hence rendering it a true overlay
      Overlay(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color fillColor, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color lineColor, float regionWidth, float regionHeight, int lineThickness)
      Creates a stage that itself places a table of the specified parameters in the centre of the screen The overlay's [draw()] method is unlike that of the standard Stage class as it also draws a bordered rectangle behind the overlay region, hence rendering it a true overlay Overloaded constructor places the overlay at the very centre of the screen
      Overlay(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color fillColor, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color lineColor, int lineThickness)
      Creates a stage that itself places a table of the specified parameters in the centre of the screen The overlay's [draw()] method is unlike that of the standard Stage class as it also draws a bordered rectangle behind the overlay region, hence rendering it a true overlay Overloaded constructor assumes that the overlay's size is the size of the game's window at the time of the overlay's declaration

      void resize(float regionWidth, float regionHeight)
      Re-sizes the overlay to cover the specified parameters

    • Constructor Detail

      • Overlay

        public Overlay(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color fillColor,
               com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color lineColor,
               float regionWidth,
               float regionHeight,
               float xOffset,
               float yOffset,
               int lineThickness)
        Creates a stage that itself places a table of the specified parameters to an offset away from centre of the screen The overlay's [draw()] method is unlike that of the standard Stage class as it also draws a bordered rectangle behind the overlay region, hence rendering it a true overlay
        Parameters:
        fillColor - The colour of the overlay's background
        lineColor - The colour of the overlay's border
        regionWidth - The width of the overlay
        regionHeight - The height of the overlay
        xOffset - Distance between the centre of the overlay and the centre of window on the X-axis (in pixels)
        yOffset - Distance between the centre of the overlay and the centre of window on the Y-axis (in pixels)
        lineThickness - The thickness of the overlay's border

      • Overlay

        public Overlay(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color fillColor,
               com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color lineColor,
               float regionWidth,
               float regionHeight,
               int lineThickness)
        Creates a stage that itself places a table of the specified parameters in the centre of the screen The overlay's [draw()] method is unlike that of the standard Stage class as it also draws a bordered rectangle behind the overlay region, hence rendering it a true overlay Overloaded constructor places the overlay at the very centre of the screen
        Parameters:
        fillColor - The colour of the overlay's background
        lineColor - The colour of the overlay's border
        regionWidth - The width of the overlay
        regionHeight - The height of the overlay
        lineThickness - The thickness of the overlay's border

      • Overlay

        public Overlay(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color fillColor,
               com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color lineColor,
               int lineThickness)
        Creates a stage that itself places a table of the specified parameters in the centre of the screen The overlay's [draw()] method is unlike that of the standard Stage class as it also draws a bordered rectangle behind the overlay region, hence rendering it a true overlay Overloaded constructor assumes that the overlay's size is the size of the game's window at the time of the overlay's declaration
        Parameters:
        fillColor - The colour of the overlay's background
        lineColor - The colour of the overlay's border
        lineThickness - The thickness of the overlay's border

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draws every actor on the core stage (along with a complementary bordered background) on to the next frame in the game's rendering pipeline
        Overrides:

        public void resize(float regionWidth,
                   float regionHeight)
        Re-sizes the overlay to cover the specified parameters
        Parameters:

        regionHeight - The overlay's new height
